10.0 (1) REM TEST FOR PRECISION OPTION
100.0 (1) PRINT "VALUES WITH PRECISION 8"
110.0 (1) OPTION PRECISION 8
120.0 (1) LET A = 1 / 7
130.0 (1) FOR I = 1 TO 10
140.0 (10) PRINT A
150.0 (10) LET A = A / 10
160.0 (10) NEXT I
200.0 (1) PRINT "VALUES WITH PRECISION 16"
210.0 (1) OPTION PRECISION 16
220.0 (1) LET A = 1 / 7
230.0 (1) FOR I = 1 TO 12
240.0 (12) PRINT A
250.0 (12) LET A = A / 10
260.0 (12) NEXT I
300.0 (1) PRINT "VALUES WITH PRECISION INFINITE"
310.0 (1) OPTION PRECISION "INFINITE"
320.0 (1) LET A = 1 / 7
330.0 (1) FOR I = 1 TO 12
340.0 (12) PRINT A
350.0 (12) LET A = A / 10
360.0 (12) NEXT I
999.0 (1) END
